Articles.Content:
DCE Agency is a KSP parody of SCP. Located here: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=14440.0

I wanted to open this here so that the thread would not be spammed with comments, and that it would contain an unbroken line of DCEs. If that was the creators intention, anyways.

I also wanted to open this here to get people who don\'t frequent the Fan Fiction section to see what\'s going on there, and to point out, 'hey, look at this!'.
I\'m just waiting for someone to add the Space Kraken.

I\'m just waiting for someone to add the Space Kraken.

All in game glitches and anomalies are planned to be added by us. We have already planned out a ton of in game DCE\'s.
